name: Wendy's Hunt
description:
You control the protagonist as they go on an endless run through the spooky woods in a fruitless effort to get away from Wendy the Wendigo. How long will you last before finally slipping up and becoming dead meat?

A & D keys = Move left and right

Space bar = Jump

Escape Key = Pause

Music

  • Countdown by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
    Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Labyrinth of Lost Dreams by Darren Curtis | https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/ Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
